custom-sql.sql: SELECT MAX(SEQUENCENO) AS maxsequenceno FROM OEP_SSOMGT_APPLICATION WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$]
SELECT * FROM OEP_SSOMGT_APPLICATION WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$SEQUENCENO_FILTER$] ORDER BY SEQUENCENO DESC
SELECT * FROM OEP_SSOMGT_APPLICATION WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$SEQUENCENO_FILTER$] ORDER BY SEQUENCENO ASC
